mainboard.name: Esper Sentinel
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, draw a card unless that player pays {X}, where X is this creature's power.

mainboard.name: Tidehollow Sculler
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Death's Shadow
mainboard.oracle_text: This creature gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

mainboard.name: Harvester of Misery
mainboard.oracle_text:
Menace
When this creature enters, other creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
{1}{B}, Discard this card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Ride's End
mainboard.oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a tapped permanent.
Exile target creature or Vehicle.

mainboard.name: The Wandering Emperor
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
As long as The Wandering Emperor entered this turn, you may activate her loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant.
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains first strike until end of turn.
−1: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance.
−2: Exile target tapped creature. You gain 2 life.

mainboard.name: Rankle, Master of Pranks
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Rankle deals combat damage to a player, choose any number —
• Each player discards a card.
• Each player loses 1 life and draws a card.
• Each player sacrifices a creature of their choice.

mainboard.name: Drana, Liberator of Malakir
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
Whenever Drana deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control.

mainboard.name: Woe Strider
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
Sacrifice another creature: Scry 1.
Escape—{3}{B}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
This creature escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it.

mainboard.name: Midnight Reaper
mainboard.oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

mainboard.name: Sedgemoor Witch
mainboard.oracle_text:
Menace
Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this token dies, you gain 1 life."

mainboard.name: Welcoming Vampire
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more other creatures you control with power 2 or less enter, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

mainboard.name: Soul Partition
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast by an opponent this way costs {2} more to cast.

mainboard.name: Journey to Nowhere
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile target creature.
When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Tenacious Underdog
mainboard.oracle_text:
Blitz—{2}{B}{B}, Pay 2 life. (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
You may cast this card from your graveyard using its blitz ability.

mainboard.name: Luminarch Aspirant
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

mainboard.name: Timeline Culler
mainboard.oracle_text:
Haste
You may cast this card from your graveyard using its warp ability.
Warp—{B}, Pay 2 life. (You may cast this card from your hand or graveyard for its warp cost. If you do, exile this creature at the beginning of the next end step, then you may cast it from exile on a later turn.)

mainboard.name: Bone Shards
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

mainboard.name: Oust
mainboard.oracle_text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

mainboard.name: Path to Exile
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Lost Jitte
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put a charge counter on Lost Jitte.
Remove a charge counter from Lost Jitte: Choose one —
• Untap target land.
• Target creature can't block this turn.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature.
Equip {1}

This creature can't block.

({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
This land enters tapped.

sideboard.name: Fact or Fiction
sideboard.oracle_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

sideboard.name: Voracious Hydra
sideboard.oracle_text:
Trample
This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When this creature enters, choose one —
• Double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature.
• This creature fights target creature you don't control.

sideboard.name: Grim Bauble
sideboard.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
{2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

sideboard.name: Day of Judgment
sideboard.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.

When this artifact enters, it deals 2 damage to any target.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice another artifact: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

sideboard.name: Cankerbloom
sideboard.oracle_text:
{1}, Sacrifice this creature: Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.

sideboard.name: Faithless Looting
sideboard.oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

sideboard.name: Adanto Vanguard
sideboard.oracle_text:
As long as this creature is attacking, it gets +2/+0.
Pay 4 life: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

sideboard.name: Knight of the Reliquary
sideboard.oracle_text:
This creature gets +1/+1 for each land card in your graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice a Forest or Plains: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

sideboard.name: Birthing Ritual
sideboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature, look at the top seven cards of your library. Then you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, you may put a creature card with mana value X or less from among those cards onto the battlefield, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

sideboard.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, exile up to one target artifact or creature until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
Channel — {1}{W}, Discard this card: Exile target artifact or creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

sideboard.name: Harm's Way
sideboard.oracle_text: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.

sideboard.name: Ulcerate
sideboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

sideboard.name: Warden of the Inner Sky
sideboard.oracle_text:
As long as this creature has three or more counters on it, it has flying and vigilance.
Tap three untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Scry 1. Activate only as a sorcery.

sideboard.name: Field of the Dead
sideboard.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
Whenever this land or another land you control enters, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
